mapper.select: SELECT c1.COURSE_NAME AS PRE_COURSE_NAME, c_p1.COURSE_DEVISION AS PRE_COURSE_DEVISION, c_p1.GRADE AS PRE_GRADE, c_p1.COURSE_TERM AS PRE_COURSE_TERM, c1.CREDIT AS PRE_CREDIT, c2.COURSE_NAME AS POST_COURSE_NAME, c_p2.COURSE_DEVISION AS POST_COURSE_DEVISION, c_p2.GRADE AS POST_GRADE, c_p2.COURSE_TERM AS POST_COURSE_TERM, c2.CREDIT AS POST_CREDIT FROM DEPARTMENT d JOIN COURSE_PROPERTY c_p1 ON c_p1.DEPARTMENT_CODE = d.DEPARTMENT_CODE JOIN COURSE c1 ON c1.COURSE_CODE = c_p1.COURSE_CODE JOIN COURSE_PROPERTY c_p2 on c_p2.DEPARTMENT_CODE = d.DEPARTMENT_CODE JOIN COURSE c2 ON c2.COURSE_CODE = c_p2.COURSE_CODE JOIN COURSE_PRE_POST p on p.COURSE_PRE_CODE = c1.COURSE_CODE AND p.COURSE_POST_CODE = c2.COURSE_CODE WHERE d.DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentName} ORDER BY c_p1.GRADE, c1.COURSE_NAME
